A total 60 child family recruit . The intervention include weekly Internet session tailor individual child eight week three Internet session parent . Children parent control group receive general health information healthy eating , active lifestyle , dental care , smoke cessation , risk take issue via Internet . The content session describe later . After informed consent obtain parent verbal assent child , baseline data ( T0 ) collect assign child parent intervention group control group . Follow-up data group collect 2 month ( T1 ) , 4 month ( T2 ) 6 month ( T3 ) baseline .
